mapper.select: select a.board_no board_no,a.member_id member_id,a.board_type board_type,a.board_title board_title,a.board_content board_content, a.board_date board_date,a.view_cnt view_cnt,a.board_fname board_fname,a.board_fsize board_fsize,a.parent_board_no parent_board_no,b.lvl as lvl FROM board a,(select board_no,ROWNUM rm,lvl FROM(SELECT board_no,Level lvl FROM board WHERE board_type=#{boardType} start with parent_board_no is null connect by prior board_no = parent_board_no order SIBLINGS by board_date desc)) b WHERE a.board_no=b.board_no and b.rm>=#{startRow} and b.rm<=#{endRow}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET view_cnt=view_cnt+1 WHERE trim(board_no)=trim(#{boardNo})
